project_descr: The overall objective of the project is to ensure the balanced and resilient development of the Republic of Armenia regions through an integrated socio-economic approach including increasing the capacities of the local population.

outputs.output_descr: Integrated Support to Rural Development: Building Resilient Communities - support to 45 bordering communities of Tavush region.

document_name: Feasibility study of establishment of forest products harvesting and processing production unit in Voskepar and value chain analysis within the Joint Development Program of Voskepar, Baghanis, Voskevan, Kirants, Nerqin Tsakhavan, Acharkut vill. of Tavush
